All_Day_Breakfast.name: Steak & Mash Potato
All_Day_Breakfast.ingredients: Tender battered local mini beef steak with cubed potato hash sautéed in butter and parsley flakes then finally topped with sunny side up egg alongside peppercorn sauce.

All_Day_Breakfast.name: American Breakfast

All_Day_Breakfast.name: Full Nigerian Breakfast

All_Day_Breakfast.ingredients: Carrots and mixed bell peppers egg omelet with crispy chicken fillet, chicken flank on a bed of lettuce and tomato with sweet tomato sauce served with sauté potato.

All_Day_Breakfast.name: Crispy Yam & Egg
All_Day_Breakfast.ingredients: Soft on the inside and crisp golden on the outside fried yam with egg sauce made with tomato and sweet onions.

All_Day_Breakfast.ingredients: Nutritionally balanced Nigerian combo, fried plantain strips with Nigerian-style tomato sauce and topped with eggs of your choice.

All_Day_Breakfast.name: Omelet & Toast
All_Day_Breakfast.ingredients: 3 Eggs open-face omelet infused with sweet carrots, onion, green bell pepper, tomato with chicken sausage, toast bread and our house tomato sauce.
